alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 9:06PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Charlotte and northern Lee Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 906 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Cape Coral, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Punta Gorda, Lehigh Acres, Port Charlotte, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Pine Island Center, McGregor, Babcock Ranch, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Charlotte County Airport, Pineland, and Buckingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
